Text: Why MKV files ?  These are next to impossible to play (on a Mac) or convert.  Why, when there are so many other reliable formats ?
Plays fine for me.  Haven't watched it all but it's the best 720 rip I've ever seen at 750 megs.  Good subtitles too.  Thanks to sunDox. may you continue to shine!

..the AUDIO and VIDEO quality is suprasingly good for a video of this size...its like in 2gb rips...
Great job and BIG thanks to the uploader...

Hi sunDox,
I had better add some more as the previous message that I left is seriously unfair & lacks detail - my apologies to you sunDox.
The movie will not play with VLC or Windows Media on my computer & this is a first for me. HOWEVER it plays fine on the 50inch Plasma via the media center & quality is good. So I converted it to AVI with AVS but lost the subs. Thus I will be content to watch it on the TV & not set it up to be used on a computer.

V - 9/10
Sync - 10/10
